name: CAT THE DJ
description:
(Mail Address - catsbystudio@gmail.com)

Want to learn DJing?
The funniest and easiest way to learn how to Djing!!
Try CAT THE DJ!!

Learn basic skills on training mode!
And have fun developing your DJing skills in Game Play Mode!
And finally, create your own DJ mix set in Free Play Mode!

A DJing rhythm game that you can learn DJing in the bedroom playing games!!
